documentation.text: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
@dev Harvest methods are only callable by the authorized treasury manager contract
@dev Checks if the currency ID is valid
@notice Sets the new treasury manager contract
@notice redeems and transfers tokens to the treasury manager contract

claimCOMPAndTransfer(address[]).notice: Claims COMP incentives earned and transfers to the treasury manager contract.

params.cTokens: a list of cTokens to claim incentives for

setReserveBuffer(uint16,uint256).notice: Sets the reserve buffer. This is the amount of reserve balance to keep denominated in 1e8 The reserve cannot be harvested if it's below this amount. This portion of the reserve will remain on the contract to act as a buffer against potential insolvency.

params.bufferAmount: reserve buffer amount to keep in internal token precision (1e8)
params.currencyId: refers to the currency of the reserve

setReserveCashBalance(uint16,int256).notice: This is used in the case of insolvency. It allows the owner to re-align the reserve with its correct balance.

params.currencyId: refers to the currency of the reserve
params.newBalance: new reserve balance to set, must be less than the current balance

transferReserveToTreasury(uint16[]).notice: Transfers some amount of reserve assets to the treasury manager contract to be invested into the sNOTE pool.

params.currencies: an array of currencies to transfer from Notional

setTreasuryManager(address).notice: Sets the new treasury manager contract

ExcessReserveBalanceHarvested(uint16,int.notice: Emitted when reserve balance is harvested

ReserveBalanceUpdated(uint16,int256).notice: Emitted when reserve balance is updated
